strapiPost.title: Regional Exhibition Selection
strapiPost.content:
Walton Arts Center is kicking off its 30th anniversary season with an exhibition showcasing creative talents within Northwest Arkansas.

  • Works by local artists representing 16 cities across the region will be featured in Our Art, Our Region, Our Time, on display Sept. 30 to Nov. 5. The exhibition includes 73 pieces by 64 artists of diverse communities that call NWA home.
  • The public is invited to a free opening reception 6-8 pm on Thursday, Sept. 30 at Walton Arts Center. The free exhibition will be open from noon to 2 pm on weekdays Oct. 1 through Nov. 5.

Learn more about the artist selected HERE
